content: Hey y'all, apologies if I missed this, but is there currently a way to turn arbitrary values into strings in Roc? I was hoping to create a test assertion helper so that (1 |> Expect.equal 2) could give error messages that print the actual vs. expected values.
there isn't a way to do that at the moment, although the built-in expect keyword will be able to do this!
Okay, makes sense, thanks for the info!
